Package com.petersamokhin.bots.sdk.callbacks

Class Callback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.petersamokhin.bots.sdk.callbacks.Callback

  • public abstract class Callback
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for event callbacks You can override only necessary methods to get events

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Callback​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onAudioMessage​(Message message)
      onAudioMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains at least one audio (not voice message).
      void onDocMessage​(Message message)
      onDocMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains at least one doc.
      void onGifMessage​(Message message)
      onGifMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains at least one gif.
      void onLinkMessage​(Message message)
      onLinkMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains link.
      void onMessage​(Message message)
      onMessage callback will be called on every incoming messages.
      void onPhotoMessage​(Message message)
      onPhotoMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains at least one photo.
      void onSimpleTextMessage​(Message message)
      onSimpleTextMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains only text and no attachments.
      void onStickerMessage​(Message message)
      onStickerMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains sticker.
      void onTyping​(java.lang.Integer user_id)
      onTyping callback will be called when users start typing.
      void onVideoMessage​(Message message)
      onVideoMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains at least one video.
      void onVoiceMessage​(Message message)
      onVoiceMessage callback will be called on every voice message.
      void onWallMessage​(Message message)
      onWallMessage callback will be called on every messages that contains at least one wall post.
